item.description:
Note the later start time: 1 p.m., rather than noon.

Swap theme #1: Below the surface

Swap theme #2: Use punchies in your card. If you were at the June Meetup you were able to use a huge variety of punches and paper to make these. If not, you may have some already in your stash. Any diecut paper or cardstock will be fine.

Swap #3: I got a GREAT bunch of cards from the Georgia Peaches--many multi-part cards. Bring your extras for swapping--you won't be sorry!

SPECIAL ACTIVITY: Super jam session! Karen will lead us in doing three rounds of jam (or collaborative) ATCs, and afterward, we'll do some swapping. We'll provide all the instructions onsite.

What to bring: While we will have a small number of blank cards and collage materials to share, please bring your own cards if you have them, and your own tools (glue sticks, ink pads fo stamping, etc.). See the Meetup home page (where you RSVP) for more details. As always, participation is optional.
item.how_to_find_us: Enter through door off parking lot (toward back of building)

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: NE ATC+ July Meetup in Natick: Saturday, 7/28
